```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
  # Install required package
  library(DBI)
  library(odbc)
  library(tidyverse)
  library(sf)
  library(lubridate)
  library(knitr)
  library(digest)
  library(RPostgres)
  #Not in logical
  `%!in%` <- Negate(`%in%`)
  
  dataconv <- dbConnect(odbc(),
    Driver = "ODBC Driver 17 for SQL Server",
    Server = "pwdgissql",
    Database = "OWS_GISDATA",
    uid = "gisread",
    pwd= "gisread")
  
   dataconv_st <- paste0("MSSQL:server=PWDGISSQL;",
                        "database=OWS_GISDATA;",
                        "UID=", "gisread", ";",
                        "PWD=", "gisread", ";")
  
```

# Test st-read() on OWS_GISDATA

```{r}

test <- st_read(dataconv_st, "OWS_GISDATA.OWS.GSWI_SMP_Polygons", quiet = TRUE)

test_df <- dbGetQuery(dataconv, SQL("select * from OWS_GISDATA.OWS.GSWI_SMP_Polygons"))

```
